definitions.definition: to push something or someone with your finger or with a pointed object:
examples: I prodded her in the back to get her attention.

definitions.definition: to encourage someone to take action, especially when they are being slow or unwilling:
examples: He gets things done, but only after I've prodded him into doing them.

definitions.definition: an act of pushing something or someone with your finger or with a pointed object:
examples: He gave her a prod in the ribs.
She hasn't ordered that book for me yet - I must give her a prod.
